resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully! Please sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

signup.title: Join Our Creative Community
signup.subtitle: Start your creative journey with exclusive features
signup.termsPrefix: By signing up, you agree to our

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailSent: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

common.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
common.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

store.title: Connect Your Store
store.subtitle: Choose your platform and connect your store
store.selectPlatformSubtitle: Choose the platform your website is built on to optimize integration
store.selectPlatformRequired: Please select a platform to continue
store.error: Failed to connect store. Please try again.
store.formErrors: Please fix the form errors before submitting
store.integrationSubtitle: Please provide the details for your {{platform}} website.

terms.accept: I agree to the terms and conditions and authorize XBlog to access my store

guide.title: Integration Guide
guide.description: This video shows how to find and set up the required credentials for your {{platform}} store integration.
guide.dialogDescription: Follow this guide to find and set up the required credentials for your {{platform}} store integration.

dashboard.scheduleArticlePrompt: Schedule your next article to maintain consistent content publishing

regenerate.label: Regenerations
regenerate.info: Regenerations allow you to recreate content. Each regeneration decreases your available count.
regenerate.notEnough: No regenerations available. Please upgrade your plan for more.
regenerate.upgradeMessage: Upgrade your plan to get more regenerations.
regenerate.error: Failed to use regeneration. Please try again.

example.title: Regeneration System Example
example.description: This is an example of how to use the regeneration system. You have {{count}} regenerations available.
example.contentDescription: This is some example content that can be regenerated.

points.label: Points
points.info: Points are used when generating content with AI. Each generation costs points based on the type of content.
points.notEnough: Not enough points for this operation
points.generationRequires: Generating {{type}} requires {{points}} points. You have {{remaining}} points remaining.
points.upgradeMessage: Upgrade your plan to get more points or wait for your points to refresh.

tooltips.articleType: Choose the type of article that best fits your content goals
tooltips.articleSize: Determines the length and depth of your article
tooltips.toneOfVoice: Sets the overall tone and style of writing for your article
tooltips.pointOfView: Determines the perspective from which your article is written
tooltips.aiContentCleaning: Controls how AI-generated text is processed to sound more natural
tooltips.imageQuality: Sets the resolution and quality of generated images
tooltips.imagePlacement: Determines where images will be placed within your article
tooltips.imageStyle: Sets the visual style for generated images
tooltips.numberOfImages: Total number of images to include in your article
tooltips.numberOfVideos: Specify how many videos should be embedded in your article
tooltips.internalLinking: Select which of your websites to link to within the article
tooltips.externalLinking: Choose which external sources to reference in your article or type your own

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
error.reportIssue: If this issue persists, please report it to our support team.

templates.title: Article Templates
templates.subtitle: Choose from our SEO-optimized templates to create high-quality content
templates.locked_message: Templates feature is currently in development and will be available soon. Stay tuned for updates!
templates.unlock_message: This feature will be available in the next update. Thank you for your patience!

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and subscription

subscription.choosePlan: Choose the plan that works best for you
subscription.daysRemaining: Your subscription will expire in {{days}} days. Renew now to avoid service interruption.

ai_chat.title: AI Assistance Chat
ai_chat.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
ai_chat.sample_response: I'm currently in development. Soon I'll be able to help you with content creation, SEO optimization, and more!
ai_chat.locked_message: This feature is currently in development and will be available soon. Stay tuned for updates!
ai_chat.unlock_message: This feature will be available in the next update. Thank you for your patience!

demo.title: Book a Demo
demo.subtitle: Schedule a personalized demo with our team to see how we can help your business grow

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your needs and what you'd like to learn in the demo...

confirmation.title: Demo Scheduled Successfully!
confirmation.message: Thank you for scheduling a demo with us. We've sent a confirmation email with all the details.
confirmation.step1: You'll receive a calendar invitation for the scheduled time
confirmation.step2: Our team will prepare a personalized demo based on your needs
confirmation.step3: We'll send you a reminder 1 hour before the scheduled demo

emailSent.title: Demo Scheduled!
emailSent.message: We've sent you a confirmation email with all the details.

video.title: Why Book a Demo?
video.description: See how our team provides exceptional support and quick responses to help you maximize your results.
video.dialogDescription: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with any questions or issues you might have. We pride ourselves on quick response times and personalized solutions.

benefits.title: Benefits of Booking a Demo
benefits.benefit1: Get personalized guidance from our expert team
benefits.benefit2: See real-time examples of how our platform can solve your specific challenges
benefits.benefit3: Receive a custom implementation plan tailored to your business needs

onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Let's get to know you better so we can personalize your experience.
onboarding.planSubtitle: Select a plan that works best for your content creation needs.

interests.title: What are you interested in?
interests.subtitle: Select all that apply. This helps us personalize your dashboard.

referral.title: How did you hear about us?
